MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL36 postcode area of Tywyn, affecting properties in Happy Valley and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.07PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a broken piece of equipment on the overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 7.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.36PM on 18th December 2020.
